name: Amerigo Resources Ltd.
longDescription: Amerigo Resources Ltd is principally engaged in the production of copper and molybdenum concentrates through its operating subsidiary Minera Valle Central S.A. The group operates in one segment, the production of copper concentrates with the production of molybdenum concentrates as a by-product. The company geographically operates in Chile and Canada and earns most of its revenue from Chile.

fullAddress: 1021 West Hastings Street,9th Floor, Vancouver, BC, CA
